content: Update DESCRIPTION file to meet CRAN requirements
Ensure all functions have proper Roxygen documentation with executable examples
Address all R CMD check NOTES, WARNINGS, and ERRORS
Perform security audit of all dependencies
Implement comprehensive CI pipeline with multiple R versions
Add automated testing for different operating systems
Create pkgdown site with comprehensive documentation
Implement performance profiling for all functions
Create model validation and calibration tools
Add proper error messaging and user guidance
Set up automated dependency update monitoring
Create code of conduct for community contributions
